title: ANy Ideas? Any Close would be fine at this point????
author: P.I.

comments.content:
This is circa 1962 so we have to ignore newer designs.  
Perhaps photo-composition variations on [Roman No. 20](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017120028/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/modern-no-20/), which was available then under that name.  
Don
